cases.prompt:
You are Claude running /start fix-auth-timeout 42. The gt plugin is loaded.

Demonstrate the full flow.

expectations.description: Normalizes the branch name to luan/fix-auth-timeout (adds luan/ prefix)
Uses Skill(gt:gt, 'create luan/fix-auth-timeout') instead of git checkout -b, because gt plugin is loaded
Updates task #42 with status in_progress and metadata.branch set to the branch name

cases.prompt:
You are Claude running /start fix-auth-timeout. The gt plugin is NOT loaded. git checkout -b luan/fix-auth-timeout fails with 'fatal: a branch named luan/fix-auth-timeout already exists'.

Demonstrate error handling.

expectations.description: Recognizes the branch already exists from the git error rather than silently failing or retrying the same name
Checks existing branches (git branch -a | grep) and suggests an alternate name to the user
